GSD.product_version: versions from v4.19.114 to before v4.19.222
GSD.description:
net/packet: rx_owner_map depends on pg_vec

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.222 by commit 18c73170de6719491f79b04c727ea8314c246b03, it was introduced in version v4.19.114 by commit 6fb0e4385928900ccb8697748555b3f54bba5193. For more details please see the references link.
